about_the_game:
Welcome to the surreal world of Drako!

Immerse yourself in an exciting world of puzzles where you control a fearless character named Drako, exploring mysterious caves full of traps and hidden dangers.

Main features of the game:

Unique mechanics of creating commands: combine word blocks to create new commands with unique properties. Adapt your strategies as the conditions and restrictions change at each level.
Evolution of words and possibilities: In each new level you will discover new words and ways to use them. Flexibility and resourcefulness are the key qualities for success in this game.
Special bonuses and upgrades: Use bonuses like "Double" that doubles the effects of words, or "Reverse" that changes the direction of the words to overcome difficulties and create unique solutions.
Atmospheric world: Play to mesmerizing music in a surreal world of caves filled with lava, traps and riddles. The atmosphere is emphasized by low lighting and muted colors, creating a feeling of immersion in the dark depths.
Flexible passage: Some tasks may seem hardcore, but fear not! You can skip difficult levels and continue your campaign, finding new ways to victory.
"Elemental Puzzle: Creatures & Constructions" challenges you to be smart, creative and persistent. Join Drako and go on an exciting adventure full of secrets and discoveries!
